attributes.comment:
We are a family who have successfully internationally adopted three precious little
boys. It has changed our life for the better and those around us. I'm asking that
you please not raise fees to complete adoptions as the process is expensive
already. There are many orphaned and abandoned children whom need a family
to call their own. I ask that you please consider what such drastic increases will
mean to these children who only need to be given a chance, but will not receive an
opportunity due to the financial strain placed on American families as they
consider pursuing adopting as a means for growing their families.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Chrystal Lindell
